name: Best Res. HPWH (EE+DF)

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of low/high 'Add-on Control' values in 2020 from the Guidehouse source, translated to 2022$, plus installed costs mean for high HPWH in 2022 in the EIA source

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies - Appendix A
Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetime for high category in 2022, rounded down to 15 years

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies - Appendix A

_description: Highest efficiency residential heat pump water heater in 2017, operated with DR-responsive cycling
